summary: Comprehensive testing of Social Check-in features for Location Detail Page. All backend APIs (29/29 tests) and frontend UI features passed testing.
critical_code_review_comments: All 4 tabs (Social Wall, Messages, Tip DJ, Info) load correctly with proper data-testid attributes
Check-in modal correctly collects name, avatar emoji, mood selection
Who's Here section shows all checked-in users with ability to DM them
Social Wall posts display author, message, timestamp, and like button correctly
DJ Tipping shows tonight's total, tip amount buttons, message and song request fields
Info tab shows embedded Google Map, hours, contact info, and action buttons
seed_data_creation: Test check-ins and posts created during testing (cleaned up automatically)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Social check-in features fully tested and working. Backend API endpoints for check-in, social posts, DMs, and DJ tipping all functional. Frontend UI renders all tabs correctly with proper data flow.

mocked_apis.note: DJ tipping is functional but NOT connected to real payment processing

location_detail_page_loads.details: Page loads with all 4 tabs (Social Wall, Messages, Tip DJ, Info) visible with proper data-testid attributes

checkin_button_opens_modal.details: Check-in button opens modal with name input, avatar emoji selection, mood selection

checkin_creates_user.details: Check-in creates user in database, shows in Who's Here section, displays status bar with Check Out option

social_wall_shows_posts.details: Social Wall displays posts with author emoji, name, message, timestamp, and like button

users_can_post_messages.details: Checked-in users can post messages on social wall with optional image URL

users_can_like_unlike_posts.details: Like/unlike functionality works - click toggles state, shows like count

messages_tab_shows_conversations.details: Messages tab shows 'Check in to send messages' for non-checked-in users, shows conversations list for checked-in users

tip_dj_tab_shows_total.details: Tip DJ tab displays 'Tonight's DJ Tips' with total amount and count (e.g., $67.00, 10 tips received)

tip_form_allows_amount_selection.details: Tip form shows $1, $3, $5, $10, $20 buttons and custom amount input

tip_form_allows_message_and_song.details: Tip form includes message and song request fields, tips appear in Recent Tips section

info_tab_shows_map.details: Info tab displays embedded Google Maps with location marker

info_tab_shows_hours.details: Hours section shows all days with current day highlighted (Wednesday shown in red)

info_tab_shows_contact.details: Contact section shows phone number and address

info_tab_shows_action_buttons.details: Get Directions, View Menu, Order Online buttons all present

info_tab_shows_todays_special.details: Today's Special section shows day-specific special (Wine Down Wednesday - Half Price Wine)

dm_modal_opens_from_who_here.details: Clicking on another user in Who's Here opens DM modal with conversation interface

api_checkin_create.details: POST /api/checkin creates check-in with display_name, avatar_emoji, mood, message

api_social_posts_create.details: POST /api/social/posts creates post, requires valid check-in

api_social_posts_list.details: GET /api/social/posts/{location_slug} returns posts with likes_count and liked_by_me

api_dm_conversations.details: GET /api/social/dm/{id}/conversations returns conversation list with unread counts

api_dm_thread.details: GET /api/social/dm/{id}/thread/{partner_id} returns message thread, marks as read

api_dj_tip_send.details: POST /api/social/dj-tip sends tip with amount, message, song_request. Min $1 enforced

api_dj_tips_total.details: GET /api/social/dj-tips/{location_slug}/total returns today's total and count
